attributes.action: refrain from signing any documents/deals  to the detriment of Crown and Country put forward by the European Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown,as an unelected Primeminister,should not be allowed to sign away,to the detriment of Crown and Country,ANY documents/deals put forward by the EU without the express authority of the British people through a referendum.
